definition: to throw oneself at/to pounce on/to devote one's energies/to flap/to flutter/to dab/to pat/to bend over
colloquial reading for 落[luo4] in certain compounds
to fall or drop/(of the sun) to set/(of a tide) to go out/to lower/to decline or sink/to lag or fall behind/to fall onto/to rest with/to get or receive/to write down/whereabouts/settlement
to leave out/to be missing/to leave behind or forget to bring/to lag or fall behind

sentences.english: When the butt was removed the face flopped back over to the left.
sentences.chinese: 當槍托一拿掉，他的臉又重新撲落到左邊。

sentences.english: Sword rectracted, my eyes already hurting at the sight of the blood spilling and the figures dropping to the ground.
sentences.chinese: 劍入鞘，我的雙目已不能再忍睹濺血與撲落的對手。
